name: Frozen Synapse 2
description: Frozen Synapse 2 is the sequel to the award-winning turn-based tactical game. Command your squads in a vast procedurally generated city: enter any building, perform any mission, execute any strategy.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista 64-bit Processor: 2GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 & at least 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Memory: 8 GB RAM
